id: scenario-autonomous-entity-manager-scenarios-community-manager participates in community economic development as practitioner
title: Manager participates in community economic development as practitioner
description: Manager participates in community economic development as practitioner
content:
Scenario: Manager participates in community economic development as practitioner
    Given municipality seeks input on economic development strategies
    And Marcus has practical experience with democratic business model
    When community economic development planning occurs
    Then Marcus shares operational insights about democratic coordination
    And Marcus explains how eliminating extraction enabled higher wages and community programs
    And Marcus advocates for policies supporting democratic business conversions
    And Marcus participates as community member with expertise, not as business representative
    And community_elohim connects his testimony to broader movement for economic democracy
